sqlMap.sql:
SELECT ROWNUM RN, T.* FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.AUTH_GRP_ID , A.AUTH_GRP_NM , NVL(A.AUTH_GRP_DESC, ' ') AS AUTH_GRP_DESC , A.CREATE_DT , A.USE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.USE_CD, '1') AS USE_NM , A.ORD , A.USR_TYP , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ADM00004', A.USR_TYP, '1') AS USR_TYP_NM , A.ACCEPT_USE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.ACCEPT_USE_CD, '1') AS ACCEPT_USE_NM , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRJ2001 B WHERE 1=1 AND B.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND B.AUTH_GRP_ID = A.AUTH_GRP_ID ) AS ASSIGN_CNT FROM PRJ2000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
AND A.USE_CD = '01'
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC , A.ORD ASC
ORDER BY A.ORD ASC, A.AUTH_GRP_NM ASC
) T WHERE 1=1
AND T.AUTH_GRP_NM LIKE '%'||#searchTargetData#||'%'
AND T.AUTH_GRP_DESC LIKE '%'||#searchTargetData#||'%'
AND T.USE_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND T.ACCEPT_USE_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND T.USR_TYP = #searchTargetData#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM (
) Z

SELECT Z.* FROM (
) Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT ROWNUM AS RN , A.PRJ_ID , A.AUTH_GRP_ID , A.AUTH_GRP_NM , A.AUTH_GRP_DESC , A.CREATE_DT , A.USE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.USE_CD, '1') AS USE_NM , A.ORD , A.USR_TYP , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ADM00004', A.USR_TYP, '1') AS USR_TYP_NM , A.ACCEPT_USE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.ACCEPT_USE_CD, '1') AS ACCEPT_USE_NM FROM PRJ2000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PRJ2000 SET AUTH_GRP_NM = #authGrpNm# , AUTH_GRP_DESC = #authGrpDesc# , USE_CD = #useCd# , ORD = #ord# , USR_TYP = #usrTyp# , ACCEPT_USE_CD = #acceptUseCd# , MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT NVL(MAX(A.ORD), 0)+1 AS NEW_ORD FROM PRJ2000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#
AND A.PRJ_ID = 'ROOTSYSTEM_PRJ'
AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#

SELECT RN ,A.PRJ_ID ,A.AUTH_GRP_ID ,A.AUTH_GRP_NM ,NVL(A.AUTH_GRP_DESC, ' ') AS AUTH_GRP_DESC ,A.CREATE_DT ,A.USE_CD ,A.ORD ,A.USR_TYP ,SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ADM00004', A.USR_TYP, '1') AS USR_TYP_NM ,SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.ACCEPT_USE_CD, '1') AS ACCEPT_USE_NM ,( SELECT count(1) FROM PRJ2000 A WHERE A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
AND A.USE_CD = '01'
AND INSTR(UPPER(AUTH_GRP_NM), UPPER(#searchTxt#)) > 0
) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN ,A.PRJ_ID ,A.AUTH_GRP_ID ,A.AUTH_GRP_NM ,A.AUTH_GRP_DESC ,A.CREATE_DT ,A.USE_CD ,A.ORD ,A.USR_TYP ,A.ACCEPT_USE_CD FROM PRJ2000 A WHERE A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
AND A.USE_CD = '01'
AND INSTR(UPPER(AUTH_GRP_NM), UPPER(#searchTxt#)) > 0
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC , A.ORD DESC
ORDER BY ORD ASC
) A WHERE A.RN BETWEEN #firstRecordIndex# + 1 AND #firstRecordIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.MENU_ID , A.MENU_NM , A.UPPER_MENU_ID , SF_STM2000_MENU_NM(A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.MENU_ID, '2') AS UP_MENU_NM , (SELECT UPPER_MENU_ID FROM STM2000 Z WHERE Z.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND Z.MENU_ID = A.UPPER_MENU_ID) AS UPUP_MENU_ID , SF_STM2000_MENU_NM(A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.MENU_ID, '3') AS UPUP_MENU_NM , COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY SF_STM2000_MENU_NM(A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.MENU_ID, '3')) AS GRP_CNT , RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY SF_STM2000_MENU_NM(A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.MENU_ID, '3') ORDER BY ORD ASC) AS GRP_RANK , B.PRJ_ID , B.AUTH_GRP_ID , NVL(B.MAIN_YN, 'N') AS MAIN_YN , NVL(B.ACCESS_YN, 'N') AS ACCESS_YN , NVL(B.SELECT_YN, 'N') AS SELECT_YN , NVL(B.REG_YN, 'N') AS REG_YN , NVL(B.MODIFY_YN, 'N') AS MODIFY_YN , NVL(B.DEL_YN, 'N') AS DEL_YN , NVL(B.EXCEL_YN, 'N') AS EXCEL_YN , NVL(B.PRINT_YN, 'N') AS PRINT_YN , 'R' AS STATUS , A.MENU_TYPE_CD , A.ORD , A.LVL , A.MODULE_TYPE FROM STM2000 A , (SELECT * FROM STM2001 WHERE 1=1 AND AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId# AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND PRJ_ID = #prjId#) B WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID(+) AND A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID(+) AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#
AND A.SYS_CD = '02'
AND A.USE_CD = '01' ) Z START WITH Z.UPPER_MENU_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR Z.MENU_ID = Z.UPPER_MENU_ID OR Z.UPPER_MENU_ID = Z.UPUP_MENU_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY Z.ORD ASC ) Y WHERE 1=1 AND Y.LVL = 3
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_AUTH_GRP_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_AUTH_GRP_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'AUT' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_REQ_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(AUTH_GRP_ID) AS NEW_AUTH_GRP_ID FROM PRJ2000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #selPrjId# AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID LIKE 'AUT' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
INSERT INTO PRJ2000 ( PRJ_ID, AUTH_GRP_ID, AUTH_GRP_NM, AUTH_GRP_DESC, CREATE_DT, USE_CD, ORD, REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP, MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP, LIC_GRP_ID, USR_TYP, ACCEPT_USE_CD ) VALUES ( #prjId#, NVL(#orginAuthGrpId#,#newAuthGrpId#), #authGrpNm#, #authGrpDesc#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), #useCd#, #ord#, SYSDATE, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp#, SYSDATE, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp#, #licGrpId#, #usrTyp#, #acceptUseCd# )
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM PRJ2000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId#

DELETE FROM PRJ2001 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId#

DELETE FROM STM2001 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PRJ2001 A ( PRJ_ID, AUTH_GRP_ID, USR_ID, REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP, MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) SELECT #prjId# , #authGrpId# , A.USR_ID , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# , SYSDATE , #modifyUsrId# , #modifyUsrIp# FROM STM3000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.USR_ID = #usrId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PRJ2001 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId# AND A.USR_ID = #usrId#
